europeana:record.dc:title: Taxonomic identity of Trochilus verticalis Deppe, 1830
Zoologische Mededelingen
europeana:record.dc:creator: Quaisser C.
Weller A.-A.
europeana:record.dc:subject: Aves
Trochilidae
Trochilus verticalis
Agyrtria cyanocephala
Agyrtria violiceps
lectotype designation
europeana:record.dc:description: The type series of Trochilus verticalis Deppe, 1830, deposited in the collections of the Museum f√ºr Naturkunde Berlin (ZMB) and the Naturhistorisches Museum Wien (NMW), consists of five specimens of different taxa and one specimen with aberrant characters. However, the original description of verticalis refers to Agyrtria cyanocephala (Lesson, 1829), to which only the two NMW specimens clearly correspond. Therefore NMW 2.670 (male, Perote) is designated as lectotype of Trochilus verticalis Deppe, 1830.
europeana:record.dcterms:isPartOf: Taxonomic identity of Trochilus verticalis Deppe, 1830 (URN:ISSN:00240672) (Volume 79-3)
